review: I don't know if it was because this was a refurbished unit, or the location of the HDMI port on my tv, but I could not get a good connection with the stick.  We already have three other Roku box units and with the newest tv addition in our kitchen I thought this would be perfect. I did return it and got a Roku 1 which works perfectly connected through the composite (R Y W) cable.  The streaming stick arrived as promised was in perfect packaging, just didn't work for me.
